channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Aboard a nuclear-powered submarine, 'everything changes on a dime'
Republican-led House passes bill to limit nationwide orders from federal district judges
Trump's 'buy' tip on social media before his tariffs pause made money for investors who listened
The odds of a US recession are 'on a coin flip,' economist says
Canadian PM: Negotiations with Trump on economic, security relationship to begin after election
World markets jump after Trump delays most tariff hikes, but not U.S. futures
item.description: Investors on overseas financial markets welcomed President Trump's decision to put most of his his sharp tariff hikes on hold for 90 days.

item.title: China says it's open to talks as Trump pauses tariffs on other nations
item.description: As Trump leaves China alone in facing high U.S. tariffs, Beijing says "the door to talks is open," but dialogue must come with "mutual respect."

item.title: Hopes fade of finding survivors of roof collapse at Santo Domingo nightclub
item.description: Rescue crews in the Dominican Republic dug through the remains of a legendary nightclub whose roof collapsed, but hopes of finding survivors were slim...

item.title: Octavio Dotel, former MLB pitcher, dies in Dominican nightclub roof collapse
item.description: Former MLB players Octavio Dotel and Tony Blanco died after the roof of the Jet Set nightclub in Santo Domingo collapsed during a performance by meren...

item.title: Michelle Obama addresses divorce rumors about her and Barack Obama
item.description: Michelle Obama addressed divorce rumors in part two of her conversation with Sophia Bush on the podcast, "Work in Progress."

item.title: Trump’s new energy order puts states’ climate laws in the crosshairs of the Department of Justice

item.title: WATCH: Family demands answers after pallbearers fall into grave at burial
item.description: A family in Philadelphia is outraged after a graveside platform collapsed at their loved one's burial.

item.title: Democratic Party 'doubling down' on town hall meetings targeting GOP-held districts

item.title: Teen shark attack survivor presses lawmakers for new alert system

item.title: Ksenia Karelina, US ballet dancer, released from Russia in prisoner exchange
item.description: U.S.-Russian dual citizen Ksenia Karelina was released from Russian prison in an overnight prisoner exchange, Secretary of State Marco Rubio announced...

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: 'Selfish' US using tariffs as 'weapon,' China says

item.title: A California soccer coach charged in a 13-year-old’s death is accused of assaulting other teens
Americans convicted in Congo of a botched coup attempt now face US charges
